channel.title: Baosen Zhang
channel.description: Baosen Zhang is an Assistant Professor in the Electrical Engineering Department at the University of Washington.

item.title: Special Issue of IEEE Transaction on Smartgrid
item.description:
Please consider submitting to IEEE Transactions on Smart Grid Special Section on Distributed Control and Efficient Optimization Methods for Smart Grid.

The call is here

item.title: Paper in ACM E-Energy
item.description:
Paper to appear in ACM E-Energy

  1. Y. Shi, B. Xu, B. Zhang, and D. Wang, “Leveraging energy storage to optimize data center electricity cost in emerging power markets,” in ACM E-Energy 2016, 2016.
    • BibTeX
      • @inproceedings{ShiEtAl2016,
  author = {Shi, Yuanyuan and Xu, Bolun and Zhang, Baosen and Wang, Di},
  title = {Leveraging energy storage to optimize data center electricity cost in emerging power markets},
  booktitle = {ACM E-Energy 2016},
  year = {2016},
  link = {http://arxiv.org/abs/1606.01536},
  blog = {2016-6-16},
  __markedentry = {[zhangbao:6]}
}
    • Download

item.title: Two Papers to CDC
item.description:
Two papers submitted to CDC:

  1. L. J. Ratliff, C. Dowling, E. Mazumdar, and B. Zhang, “To Observe or Not to Observe: Queuing Game Framework for Urban Parking,” in Submitted to IEEE Conference on Decision and Control, 2016.
    • BibTeX
      • @inproceedings{RatliffEtAl2016,
  author = {Ratliff, L. J. and Dowling, C. and Mazumdar, E. and Zhang, B.},
  title = {To Observe or Not to Observe: Queuing Game Framework for Urban Parking},
  booktitle = {Submitted to IEEE Conference on Decision and Control},
  year = {2016},
  link = {https://www.dropbox.com/s/2lj40bobpsgi215/2016cdc.pdf?dl=0},
  blog = {2016-3-19}
}
    • Download
  2. J. E. Contreras-Ocaña, M. A. Ortega-Vazquez, and B. Zhang, “Cooperation and Competition among Energy Storages,” arXiv preprint arXiv:1511.02201, 2015.
    • BibTeX
      • @article{Contreras-OcanaEtAl2015,
  author = {Contreras-Oca{\~n}a, Jesus E and Ortega-Vazquez, Miguel A and Zhang, Baosen},
  title = {Cooperation and Competition among Energy Storages},
  journal = {arXiv preprint arXiv:1511.02201},
  year = {2015},
  link = {http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.02201},
  blog = {2016-3-19},
  arxiv = {yes}
}
    • Download

item.title: Paper on Online Active Learning Submitted to ICML
item.description:
Paper submitted to ICML:
